SEARCH
Package datastruct

Interface Table<E extends Comparable<E>,T>

Type Parameters:
E - the type of the keys
T - the type of the data
All Known Implementing Classes:
BinaryTreeTable
public interface Table<E extends Comparable<E>,T>
Interface for a table of key/data pairs

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    delete(E key)
    Destroys the node corresponding to the key passed as a parameter.
    boolean
    insert(E key, T data)
    If the key does not already exist in the table, this method inserts a new node with the key and data passed as parameters.
    T
    select(E key)
    This method returns the data contained in the node corresponding to the search key key passed as a parameter.

  • Method Details

    • select

      T select(E key)
      This method returns the data contained in the node corresponding to the search key key passed as a parameter. Returns null if the key does not exist
      Parameters:
      key - the key to search for
      Returns:
      the data associated with the key, or null if the key does not exist

    • insert

      boolean insert(E key, T data)
      If the key does not already exist in the table, this method inserts a new node with the key and data passed as parameters. Returns false if the insertion was not possible.
      Parameters:
      key - the key to insert
      data - the data to insert
      Returns:
      true if the insertion was successful, false otherwise

    • delete

      boolean delete(E key)
      Destroys the node corresponding to the key passed as a parameter. Returns false if the deletion was not possible (i.e. the key does not exist).
      Parameters:
      key - the key to delete
      Returns:
      true if the deletion was successful, false otherwise
